## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fa70e76a995c21512e5537f8ba45c8143816593a98f504f5ac88ad3e752d9eaa)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'atlassian-plugins-jquery' @ 0.0.0-dev (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
